members.signatureBeforeChange: public Cursor (Device device, ImageData source, ImageData mask, int hotspotX, int hotspotY)
members.signatureAfterChange: public Cursor (Device device, ImageData source, ImageData mask, int hotspotX, int hotspotY)
diff: -	int sourcePixmap = OS.XCreateBitmapFromData(xDisplay, drawable, sourceData, source.width, source.height);
-	int maskPixmap = OS.XCreateBitmapFromData(xDisplay, drawable, maskData, source.width, source.height);
-	handle = OS.XCreatePixmapCursor(xDisplay, maskPixmap, sourcePixmap, foreground, background, hotspotX, hotspotY);
+	handle = createCursor(sourceData, maskData, source.width, source.height, hotspotX, hotspotY);

members.signatureBeforeChange: public Cursor(Device device, ImageData source, ImageData mask, int hotspotX, int hotspotY)
members.signatureAfterChange: public Cursor(Device device, ImageData source, ImageData mask, int hotspotX, int hotspotY)
diff: -	int /*long*/ sourcePixmap = OS.gdk_bitmap_create_from_data(0, sourceData, source.width, source.height);
-	int /*long*/ maskPixmap = OS.gdk_bitmap_create_from_data(0, maskData, source.width, source.height);
-	/* For some reason, mask and source take reverse roles, both here and on Motif */
-	handle = OS.gdk_cursor_new_from_pixmap (maskPixmap, sourcePixmap, foreground, background, hotspotX, hotspotY);
+	handle = createCursor(sourceData, maskData, source.width, source.height, hotspotX, hotspotY);
